en: Did you hear? They made a movie out of Bon-Bon Fighters - that old TV-show we were obsessed with in elementary school! We have to go to the premiere tonight.
Ugh, that was boring as heck. But at least we got to hang out!
"Man. I feel like I haven't seen you in forever. We used to be really close. I can't be the only one putting effort in, you know."
